speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I recognize Jan Christensen, an intern in my Washington, DC, office, for all of the hard work she has done for me, my staff, and the State of South Dakota over the past several months.

Jan is a graduate of Mitchell High School in Mitchell, SD. Currently she is attending the University of South Dakota, where she is majoring in political science. She is a hard worker who has been dedicated to getting the most out of her internship experience.
I would like to extend my sincere thanks and appreciation to Jan for all of the fine work she has done and wish her continued success in the years to come.
